column4: Hi, I know this isn't ubuntu specific but perhaps someone has some help?  I have a manual for a device in pdf in Russian, can I translate it to english somehow? or is there a way to copy/paste text into google translate?
copy content from your pdf file, translate it and make a pdf of english version w/ open office
thankyou.  I'll try it.  Thanks for pointing me in the right direction
See you in most wanted's list of *ackers! :)
